ingredients.item: 150g essential Waitrose Broccoli, cut into florets
1 essential Waitrose British Sirloin Steak, trimmed

instructions.step: Cook the broccoli in a steamer or colander over a pan of simmering water for 4-5 minutes until just tender.

Meanwhile, spread the steak with the wasabi paste on both sides. Heat 2 tsp oil in a frying pan and fry the steak for 2 minutes on each side (for rare). Allow to rest for 2-3 minutes before thinly slicing.
Whisk the lemon juice with the remaining oil and season, toss into the salad with the tomatoes and broccoli and serve topped with the steak.
